## Building Continuum â€” Chapter 8 â€” No One Asked Me to Build This

Continuum did not begin with a grant, a job offer, or a market request. No one commissioned it. No one demanded it. This chapter explores the psychological isolation of building something uninvited â€” and the difference between being called and being validated.
